overview: A mystery soda called "DRINK THIS!" begins magically appearing during a Fourth of July pool party, and murderous chaos ensues. Nobody can seem to resist its icy gaze, or the persistent voice heard from beyond, encouraging you to try it with the force of an over-the-top 80's commercial. Do you dare to.... DRINK THIS? Filmed in upstate New York, with the intention of reminding everyone that capitalism kills!
title: DRINK THIS!
